card.name: Shatterglade Patriarch
card.text:
If your Quanta exceeds your Max Quanta, exert and pay 2Q: Deal 1 damage to all enemy units.
Halberd in hand, he carved a path through the cursed forests of Brunell, desperate to reclaim the fallen cities of his ancestors.

card.text: Exert: Gain 1Q.

card.name: Steelskin Panda

card.text: {Kill} Unexert this unit.

card.name: Infiniflea
card.text: {Damaged} Copy this unit.

card.name: Worldblood Primordial
card.text: Costs 1Q less for each friendly unit.

card.name: Double Rainbow
card.text: Select an effect... - Draw a card. - Gain 3Q. If you have a Double Rainbow in your graveyard, activate both effects instead.

card.name: Growth Spurt
card.text: Gain 2 Max Quanta. Do not gain Max Quanta naturally for your next 2 turns.

card.name: Stampede
card.text: Scry 4 and summon up to 2 units which cost 3Q or less among them, then shuffle your deck.

card.name: Roots of the World Tree
card.text: When a friendly unit dies, give friendly units +1/+1 until the end of the turn.

card.name: Spellwright of Wonders
card.text: When you play a support, instead of resolving its effect, you can exert: Summon a Scroll relic and attach that support to it. That Scroll relic has the following effect: - Sacrifice: Cast the attached support.

card.name: Magical Acolyte
card.text: [Swift] Exert: Shuffle a card from your hand into your deck, and if you do, draw a card.

card.name: Enlightened Scholar
card.text: {Summon} Draw a card.

card.name: Shapeshifting Puddle
card.text: Exert and target a unit which costs 2Q or less: This unit transforms into it (retaining its toughness).

card.name: Elemental Residue
card.text: When you cast a support that costs 5Q or more: You can summon this card from your hand.

card.name: Imperial Spellblade
card.text: Exert and pay XQ: This unit gains +X/+X.

card.name: Imperial Caster
card.text: Exert and pay 1Q: Deal 2 damage. Pay an additional 1Q to deal 3 damage instead.

card.name: Grand Magister
card.text: {Summon} Reveal your hand and shuffle all non-support cards into your deck. Draw cards equal to the number of cards shuffled.

card.name: Spellslinging Strongman
card.text: Exert: Deal damage equal to this unit's strength. When you deal effect damage, this unit gains +1/0.

card.name: Spark
card.text: Deal 2 damage.

card.name: Insight
card.text: Draw a card and reveal it. If it was a support, draw another.

card.name: Doublecast
card.text:
Copy the next support you play this turn.
Two's better than one.

card.name: Thunderstorm
card.text: Stun all enemy units.

card.name: Focused Flames
card.text: Deal 4 damage to a unit. {Echo} Deal 4 damage to the same unit.

card.name: Meditate
card.text: You cannot declare an attack the turn you play this support. Draw 3 cards.

card.name: Brainstorm
card.text: Select an effect, twice... - Draw a card. - Stun a unit. - Deal 1 damage to all enemy units.

card.name: Library of Alunarth
card.text: {Upkeep} Draw a card for each counter on this relic. Exert, and pay 1Q for each counter on this relic: Put a counter on this relic.

card.name: Chief Charles
card.text:
Exert and sacrifice a Construct: Summon an X/X Metal Facsimile token, where X is the sacrificed Construct's Quanta cost.
"He said he'd make me cuter, but I didn't think he meant it like this!"

card.name: Ace Pilot
card.text: {Summon} Summon a 1/1 Drone token.

card.name: Spinbot
card.text: {Summon} Unexert all friendly Construct tokens.

card.text: [Swift] {Death} Deal 1 damage to all enemy units.

card.text: {Summon/Upkeep} Summon 2 3/2 Option tokens with [Swift].

card.text: Summon a Construct from your hand. Destroy it at the end of the turn.

card.name: Acid Rain
card.text: Activate when an opponent summons a unit. Deal 3 damage to it.

card.name: Budget Bomb

card.name: Drone Factory
card.text: {Upkeep} Summon a 1/1 Drone token.

card.text: When you summon a Construct token, give it +2/0. If it costs 1Q or less, also give it [Swift].

card.name: Rearguard Module
card.text: When you summon a Construct token, give it 0/+2. If it costs 1Q or less, also give it [Guard].

card.name: Time Capsule
card.text: {Summon} Select 2 different effects... - Deal 6 damage. - Give friendly units +2/+2. - Summon 4 1/1 Drone tokens. {Upkeep} Put 1 counter on this relic. Then, if this relic has 2 or more counters on it, sacrifice it and activate the selected effects.

card.name: Defense Matrix
card.text: When you summon a unit, give it [Aura]. If it is a Construct, also give it [Regenerate] until your next upkeep.

card.name: Helau, Uncrowned Queen of the Wastes
card.text:
{Upkeep} If this Quanta Lord has 15 or less life, summon a 4/3 Fledgling Scourge token.
Her brilliant plumage once bathed the skies in rainbow flair. Now, her fallen feathers instead dye the waters of Indra a dismal grey.

card.name: Writhing Flesh
card.text: When you would sacrifice a card, you can annihilate this card from your graveyard as a substitute.

card.name: Direkin Scuttler
card.text: [Toxic] When you would play this card, you can sacrifice a card instead of paying this unit's Quanta cost.

card.name: Gravetrawler
card.text:
{Summon} This unit gains +1/+1 for each different unit in each graveyard.

card.name: Voidmaw
card.text:
If a unit would die, annihilate it instead.
"Don't bother praying. Your words won't reach them."

card.name: Direkin Destroyer
card.text: {Damaged} Sacrifice a friendly unit.

card.name: Direkin Devil

card.name: Abdogul Gaar, Stygian Warden

card.name: Blaspheme
card.text: Lose 1 Max Quanta: Annihilate a card.

card.name: Soul Pact
card.text: Target an enemy unit. When you would sacrifice a card this turn: You can sacrifice that unit as if you controlled it.

card.name: Resurrection
card.text:
Resurrect a unit.
Resurrection. The unattainable opus of the arcane arts, but a mere fleeting thought from ancient gods.

card.name: Body Control
card.text:

card.name: Life Link
card.text: Target 2 cards. This turn, if one dies, so does the other.

card.name: Flesh Revolt
card.text: Activate when an enemy unit attacks. You choose the attack target (it can be another enemy unit).

card.name: Corpse Corruption
card.text: Summon a 3/2 Dire Spawn token for each unit destroyed this turn.

card.name: Stigma
card.text: {Upkeep} If this relic has 3 or more counters on it, sacrifice it: Annihilate all enemy units. When an opponent summons a unit, you can sacrifice a card: Put a counter on this relic.

card.name: Wormhole
card.text:
{Summon} Annihilate a unit. {Death} Summon that unit to your field.
In he goes, and out he comes.

card.name: Technoleech
card.text:
{Summon} Sacrifice a relic or destroy this unit.
Electricity eating parasites, often found in salvages of old machinery.

card.name: Ichor Goblin

{Death} Gain 1Q.

card.name: Scrapyard Scavenger

card.name: Sunlit Seraphim

card.text: Destroy a card, then destroy all cards with the same Quanta Cost as that card.

card.name: Clockwork Angel

card.name: Ichor Goblet

card.name: Wizened Smith

card.name: Prism Trout
card.text:
When a support targets exactly this unit, that support's owner casts a copy of that support targeting each other unit.
Mind-numbingly rare, the Prism Trout has been hunted to near extinction for their precious scales.

card.name: Eternal Paladin
card.text:
{Attack} Gain [Aura].
Though no new Eternals have been inaugurated in millenia, they still infest the ranks of the true believers.

card.name: Greedy Graverobber
card.text:
{Summon} Add a unit from an enemy graveyard to your hand.
You wouldn't believe the things people are just throwing away!

card.name: Primordial Ooze
card.text:
[Regenerate], [Drain] {Death} Shuffle up to 3 other cards from your graveyard into your deck.
Prized for their healing properties.

card.name: Living Discontinuity
card.text:

It lives in the spaces between seconds.

card.name: Radiant Giant
card.text: [Aura] Has [Shroud] while it has [Aura].

card.name: Avatar of Strife
card.text: [Swift] Exert: Your units get +1/+1.

card.name: Scion of Zenith
card.text:
[Aura], [Guard], [Swift], [Drain], [Toxic], [Pierce]
Bow before Glorious Perfection.

card.name: Dream Curator Tycho
card.text:
When an opponent plays a unit, you can pay 2Q, discard a card and exert: Return that unit to its controller's hand.
The great destroyer, dormant, is by no means diminished. At any moment, she could simply leave her dream and plunge the world into chaos once more. The enclave of the cave elects to make sure she never realizes this possibility.

card.name: Grid Bug
card.text:
[Hidden] {Upkeep} Gain +1/0.
"They have a tendency to get worse over time if not solved right away."

card.name: Observer
card.text:
{Death} Scry 3. Put them back on the top of your deck in any order.
"The great destroyer. She rests. And to keep it so, we must know her dreams."

card.name: Cracked Firewall
card.text:
{Damaged} Deal 2 damage.
"The best defense."

card.name: Sentinel
card.text:
[Guard]
So many problems within, sometimes you forget about the problems without.

card.name: Net Crawler
card.text:
Exert: Return this card to your hand. Summon a 1/1 Drone token.
"A thousand little spiders. Treading lightly on an invisible web."

card.name: Interdictor
card.text:
[Swift] Has +3/0 during your turn.
"I said HALT!!"

card.name: Apotheotic Ecclesiarch
card.text:
[Aura] When the [Aura] breaks, gains +4/+4.
"Why limit the inevitable? One way or another, this place will be the crucible of a new god."

card.name: Virolord Isoburn
card.text:
[Swift] {Kill} Deal 6 damage to a unit.
"Fire is the oldest and deadliest of infections."

card.name: Assembly
card.text:
Summon 2 1/1 Drone tokens or give a Construct +2/+2.
"Branch or commit?"

card.name: Ping
card.text:
Deal 1 damage. {Kill} Summon a 1/1 Drone token.
"Are you there. Are you there. Are you..."

card.name: Query
card.text:
Draw a card: Deal damage equal to its cost. If it costs 0, destroy a unit instead.
"Every question has an exception."

card.name: Missile Strike
card.text:
Deal 4 damage to a unit and 1 damage to all Units with the same controller.
You can't beat a classic.

card.name: Laser Beam
card.text:
Deal 10 damage to an enemy unit. Any excess damage can be dealt to other enemy units.
Destruction, with precision.

card.name: MAX POWER
card.text:
Set a unit's strength to 11.
"We crossed a line somewhere. But let's see what happens if we keep going."

card.name: Surge Capacitor
card.text:
Exert, pay 2Q: Your units gain +1/0.
"The juice must flow."

card.name: Ayna, Spirit Seeker
card.text:
Whenever a friendly unit dies, put a counter on this Quanta Lord. Remove 2 counters from any friendly card: Deal 1 damage or heal 1 life.
The living no longer remember the world. How it used to be. Only the immortal spirits still know their names. The destroyer. The titan. The pyre. The horror. The king.

card.name: Dune Mystic
card.text:
Exert: Deal 1 damage or draw 1 card.
"Outside the enclaves, life goes on as it has for centuries - poorly but steadily."

card.name: Ancient Construct
card.text:
{Echo} Gain +2/+2 or draw 2 cards.
"With its masters long gone, it travels the wastes in search of meaning."

card.name: Thaumaturgical Multicutter
card.text:
Gains +2/0 whenever a support is played. After attacking, set strength to its base value.
Magic has kept these blades as sharp as the day they were enchanted.

card.name: Hedge Seer
card.text:
Draw 1 more card during your draw phase. Shuffle 1 of them into your deck.
"The future is... unclear. Try asking again later."

card.name: Power Broker
card.text:
{Summon} If an opponent has more cards than you, put a random card from their hand into yours.
"I think you're holding out on me, friend."

card.name: Ancient Lich
card.text:
{Summon} Destroy an enemy Unit with 4 toughness or less.
The old get older. The strong get stronger.

card.name: Primordial Shape
card.text:
Once a turn, discard a card: Summon a 3/3 Elemental token with [Guard], [Hidden] or [Drain].
"What is the shape of a shape?"

card.name: Magic Dart
card.text:
Deal damage equal to your hand size to a unit.
"The original."

card.name: Mirage
card.text:
Shuffle an enemy unit into its controller's deck. They draw a card.
"It's been a hundred steps away my whole life."

card.name: Oasis
card.text:
All players draw 2 cards. All units gain 2 life.
"Spirits of the world yet persevere."

card.name: Invocation
card.text:
Deal 2 damage. Heal 2 life. Draw 1 card.
You can do anything. Just put your mind to it.

card.name: Spirit Away
card.text:
Shuffle a card that costs XQ into your deck.
A long journey can change people.

card.name: Astral Feedback
card.text:
Purge a unit. Deal 4 damage to it.
"When the angry iris of the sky opens, run."

card.name: Sandstorm
card.text:
Deal 3 damage to a unit. If it survives, return it to its controller's hand.
"You'd rather be anywhere else."

card.name: Tempest
card.text:
For each card in your hand, summon a 3/3 Elemental with [Swift]. Destroy them at the end of your turn.
"The land will never allow this to happen again."

card.name: Girimehkala, the Inheritor
card.text:
Pay 6Q: Put a counter on this Quanta Lord. When you summon a unit, give it +1/+1 for each counter on this Quanta Lord.
The fury never subsided. The grudge would carry on. The progeny of the titan took life and calamity followed.

card.name: Toothscale
card.text:
[Swift] {Attack} If this unit would kill a unit in this battle, it does not die from this battle and heals all life.
"Looking for its daily feast."

card.name: Gnarled Witch
card.text:
Whenever one of your units recovers life, deal 1 damage.
Grow tall. Or be trampled.

card.name: Shardspawn
card.text:
[Guard] When damaged, lose [Guard]: Give another friendly unit [Guard].
"The smallest pieces of the titan took a life of their own."

card.name: Leaf Roc
card.text:
{Summon} Give another friendly unit +2/0.
"The forest is watching."

card.name: Hulking Troll
card.text:
Exert: This unit heals all life.
"There are stories of people cooking and eating troll meat only to burst from within."

card.name: Arcentree
card.text:
Whenever one of your units deals 5 or more damage in battle, draw a card.
"Those who sought to fell it now adorn it."

card.name: Arahabaki, the Titanbeast
card.text:
[Swift], [Pierce]
"When the shadow falls over you, you will know fear."

card.name: Bloodbond
card.text:
Your Quanta Lord loses 5 life. Gain 2Q.
"Nothing ever comes easy."

card.name: Mantra
card.text:
Heal a unit for 4. If this fully heals it, give it [Aura].
A healing technique, almost forgotten. Coaxed from the spirits, the price unknown.

card.name: Vanguard
card.text:
Give your Quanta Lord [Guard] and [Aura] until the start of your next turn.
"The strong guard the weak, so the weak may guard the strong."

card.name: Crunch
card.text:
Deal damage equal to a friendly unit's strength.
"Claws stronger than iron. Teeth stronger than steel."

card.name: Leech
card.text:
Your Quanta Lord steals up to 6 life from an enemy unit.
Swift and brutal, or slow and agonizing. Passage of life moves at many leagues.

card.name: Voracity
card.text:
Draw a card. Pay 2 life: Draw 1 more. Pay 4 life: Draw 1 more.
It's only natural to want more.

card.name: Star Power
card.text:
Give a unit +5/+5. It has [Shroud] until the start of your next turn.
"The power of the myriad, in the service of the power of one."

card.name: Idol of Carnage
card.text:
Whenever a unit dies, put a counter on this relic. Exert: Remove all counters from this relic. Heal for an equal amount.
"Life feeds life."

card.name: Mephorash, the Reclaimer
card.text:
Exert: Transform a friendly unit into a 3/2 Dire Spawn.
"Back. We must go back. There is still time. Why can't you understand!?"

card.name: Impish Pillager
card.text:
{Attack} Mill 2 cards.
"I hope it was nothing important."

card.name: Revenant
card.text:
[Guard] If milled, summon this unit.
The fettered return. It is their turn.

card.name: Stygian Tempter
card.text:
{Summon} Take control of an enemy unit with strength of 2 or less.
"We're fighting to save you. From yourselves."

card.name: Shrouded Corruptor
card.text:
{Kill} Summon a 2/1 Spawn token for the killed unit's controller.
"If only you knew."

card.name: Dessicated
card.text:
{Summon} Steal 1 strength and toughness from all other units.
"The dead, ironically, preserved a lot better than the living."

card.name: Writhing Thing
card.text:
{Summon} Summon 3 2/1 Spawn tokens. {Death} Destroy all Spawns you control.
Tentacles. Why did it have to be tentacles.

card.name: Bloated Monstrosity
card.text:
Exert: Sacrifice this unit. Deal damage equal to its missing life to all enemy units.
"Boomer!"

card.name: Lost Signal
card.text:
{Death} Annihilate this card: Next turn, put this card into your hand. If killed by a unit, annihilate the killer.
"An eternity of screams, followed by a moment of silence."

card.name: Mitosis
card.text:
Destroy a unit: Summon 2 3/2 Dire Spawn tokens for its controller.
"From one, many."

card.name: Scourge
card.text:
Annihilate a unit.
"It's as if it never were there."

card.name: From Beyond
card.text:
Annihilate any number of cards in your graveyard: Deal that much damage to a unit.
"The living will envy the dead."

card.name: Inner Demons
card.text:
Halve an enemy unit's strength and toughness, rounding down. Summon a Shadow token with stats equal to the amount reduced.
"In your weakest moments, it grows stronger."

card.name: Despair
card.text:
Give a unit -4/-4.
Kneel.

card.name: Eclipse
card.text:
Mill 3 cards: Summon a 2/1 Spawn token for each unit milled.
"Sacrifices must be made."

card.name: Mass Lethargy
card.text:
Set the strength and toughness of all enemy units to 1.
"To remove the ability to fight, remove the will to fight."

card.name: Hungry Jelly
card.text:
Exert: Gain +2/+1.
"Mmmmm. Rich in iron. And only a hint of rust."

card.name: Untouchable
card.text:
[Shroud]
Life passes some by.

card.name: Clockstopper
card.text:
{Summon} Destroy a relic: Gain +2/+2.
We tend to destroy what we can't understand.

card.name: Pure Vessel
card.text:
{Flash} Purge this unit.
"All change is entropy. All action is corruption."

card.name: Adept
card.text:
[Aura], [Guard]
Perfection is always just beyond the horizon.

card.name: Rolling Stone
card.text:
[Swift], [Pierce]
Out of the way, scrubs.

card.name: Shimmering Dragon
card.text:
{Defend} Mill 1 card: If it was a support, negate the attack.
"It never gets old."

card.name: Mana Gorgon
card.text:
[Guard] {Death} Set enemy Q to 0.
"Petrified quanta cannot be seen. It cannot be touched. But it can be felt."

card.name: Dusklord Barrow, the Returned
card.text:
When another unit takes damage, destroy it.
"The long night has only just begun."

card.name: Trip
card.text:
Activate when an enemy summons a unit. Purge it and set its strength and toughness to 1.
"The mighty champion has fallen. And he just can't get up."

card.name: Subsume
card.text:
Sacrifice a friendly unit. Your Quanta Lord gains 8 life.
"The strings that give life are the strings that bind."

card.name: Bargain
card.text:
Swap a unit's strength and toughness.
"The scales tip."

card.name: Focus
card.text:
Give a unit [Swift].
"When you land, land on your feet."

card.name: Dominate
card.text:
Take control of an enemy unit.
Only the will of iron deserves true control.

card.name: Phantom Hammer
card.text:
Deal 4 damage to all enemy units. Annihilate all units this kills.
"Not even dust remained."

card.name: Integration Administrator
card.text:
Exert and pay 2Q: Select an effect... - Give a unit [Guard] and it becomes a Construct in addition to its other types. - Your Constructs heal 2 life.
Herald of the gleaming isle. They seek and claim. If you're lucky, they'll ask first.

card.name: Lord Bang
card.text:
{Summon} Deal damage equal to your units' combined strength bonuses.
This is it.

card.name: Devastroy
card.text:
Destroy a unit. Resurrect it. Destroy it (again).
Few get to brag of dying twice.

card.name: Modus Alpha
card.text:
At the end of each turn, your units heal 1 life for each counter on this relic. {Summon} Put a counter on this relic. Exert and pay 4Q: Put a counter on this relic.
Longtime effeciency protocol.

card.name: Modus Gamma
card.text:
When an enemy unit is destroyed: Give different friendly units any ability, except [Invulnerable], up to the number of counters on this relic. {Summon} Put a counter on this relic. Exert and pay 4Q: Put a counter on this relic.
Learning/assimilation protocol.

card.name: Modus Sigma
card.text:
{Upkeep} Your units gain +2/0 and take 2 damage for each counter on this relic. {Summon} Put a counter on this relic. Exert and pay 4Q: Put a counter on this relic.
Overload protocol.

card.name: Modus Omega
card.text:
When a friendly unit attacks, deal 2 damage and take 1 damage for each counter on this relic. {Summon} Put a counter on this relic. Exert and pay 4Q: Put a counter on this relic.
Total extermination.

card.name: Emulate
card.text:
Exert and pay 1Q: Attach a unit from your hand or graveyard to this card. Annihilate it when it is detached from this card. When you summon a token, you can detach a unit from this card with the same Quanta cost as that token: That token gains the detached unit's effects.
The second step.

card.name: Emergency Maneuvers
card.text:
When a unit would be destroyed: You can un-equip 1 card from it instead.
Just don't get hit.

card.name: NCM Procedure
card.text:
When a friendly unit dies, resurrect it and purge it. Destroy at the end of your next turn without triggering the effect of NCM Procedure.
Some choose to live for the isle. Some go a step further.

card.name: Shacklebond
card.text:
Exert: Until the end of the turn, give a unit -2/0. When it damages an enemy unit, all enemy units take the damage.
Famed Technique of Zol. Brings down foes with their own schemes.

card.name: Hopeless Horizon Soldier
card.text:
[Aura] {Upkeep} Give this unit [Aura].
You are equal to what you think, severely.

card.name: Hopeless Horizon Savant
card.text:
This unit can have 2 instances of [Aura]. {Flash} Remove [Aura] from this unit: Give it [Shroud] until the end of turn. {Summon/Upkeep} Give this unit [Aura], twice.
"Shall no-one greet me?"

card.name: The Time Being
card.text:
{Flash} Exert and pay 3Q: Annihilate a unit until the end of the turn.
It, is coming.

card.name: Clock Tower Warden
card.text:
When you would deal damage, you can exert: Place that many counters on this card instead. Exert: Remove X counters from this card and deal that much damage.
A single spire stands in the center of the crater.

card.name: Grey Crane
card.text:
Exert: Target a Quanta Lord. Until your next upkeep, the first time that Quanta Lord summons a unit, deal damage to that Quanta Lord equal to this card's strength.
"The cake has been prepared. To speak not of the wine."

card.name: The Grieving Marauder
card.text:
[Guard] At the end of your turn, you can annihilate a unit from your graveyard: This unit heals equal to its toughness or gains either +3/0 or +0/3. When this unit deals battle damage, you can annihilate a unit from your graveyard: Deal damage equal to its strength.
A remorseful cheater. This time he's playing until he loses.

card.name: Cattle Provider
card.text:
This unit can attack friendly units. {Kill} If the killed unit was friendly, heal your Quanta Lord equal to that unit's Quanta cost, then this unit gains +1/+1.
Proud chef and butcher on a quest to serve man.

card.name: Fickle Fisher
card.text:
{Flash} During an opponent's turn, exert: The turn player reveals a card in their hand, then you can swap it for a card of the same card type from your hand.
In the right moment, with the right angle, anything is possible.

card.name: Umbral Monarch
card.text:
[Swift] Ignores [Hidden]. {Flash} Exert: Give a friendly unit [Hidden] until your next upkeep.
A fair and just ruler with nothing to hide.

card.name: The Count
card.text:
{Summon} Transfer any amount of counters to this card from any other source. This card has +1/+1 for each counter on it..
So, a vampire walks into a bar...

card.name: Chronological Key
card.text:
Pay 2Q: Note down the exact state of a unit. {Flash} Exert: Return the last noted unit to its noted state.
What does it open? Merely possibilities.

card.name: Reverse the Polarity
card.text:
Activate when an opponent plays a support. Pay its cost: Activate one of the following effects... - Any strength/toughness changes caused by the support are inverted. - Select a new target for the support, as if you were the one playing the card.
Re-route the power to the flux capacitors! No one's ever tried this before!

card.name: Gaze Through the Eclipse
card.text:
{Echo 3} Draw a card for each friendly Outsider unit.
When the veil parts, look through their eyes. -Khelengue Slab

card.name: One-Masked Man
card.text:
{Summon} If all units in your graveyard have the same name, give this unit [Guard], [Drain], [Regeneration], [Toxic], [Aura].
Would you believe that the being watching you is, in fact, you?

card.name: The Eye
card.text:
{Summon} Annihilate all units.
If nothing can see you, are you really there?

card.name: Vessel Preparation
card.text:
Deal 1 damage. If this would kill the target, it is instead fully healed and it gains the following effect... {Upkeep} Deal damage equal to this card's strength to a friendly target.
What arose that day wore his name.

card.name: Boris the Breaker
card.text:
{Kill} Cards with the same name as the killed unit cannot be played for the rest of the game.
"I will break you."

card.name: Second Rider
card.text:
{Summon} Gains +2/0 for each other Second Rider summoned this game. {Death} Shuffle this unit into your deck.
Clickity clack, the rider is back.

card.name: Legendary Martial Technique
card.text:
When a friendly unit attacks, place a counter on it. When a friendly unit defends, you can remove a counter from it: Destroy the attacking unit after battle.
Balance in all things.

card.name: Dream
card.text:
Scry 5. You can swap 1 of the revealed cards with a card from your hand.
Ah, to see the world and forget it...

card.name: Reckless Cultivation
card.text:
Give a unit the following effect... - {Upkeep} This unit gains +2/+2. Destroy it if it has 10/10 or more.
Anyone can achieve power. Few can keep it.

card.name: Dark Lard
card.text:
This unit's toughness gains are doubled.
A strange mass that sleeps below a forest.

card.name: Garage Sale
card.text:
Give an opponent a card in your hand, and if you do, draw a card.
What a deal!

card.name: The Champ
card.text:
This unit's life cannot be reduced below 1 from battle.
The Champ doesn't lose.

card.name: Mildly Annoying Curse
card.text:
Your opponent summons a 1/1 Statue of an Ugly, Grinning Man token. It has the following effect... - When you play a unit, take 2 damage.
Well... damn.

card.name: Omen of Evolution
card.text:
{Summon} Declare a unit name and an ability. When you play a unit with the declared name, give it that ability, except [Invulnerable].
Natural selection tends to get dangerously close to destiny.

card.name: Primal Primordial
card.text:
You can only summon this card if every card in your graveyard is from only the Nature faction.
Does it follow only instinct, or a scheme beyond our understanding? Impossible to tell.

card.name: Big Wac
card.text:
When this unit takes damage, your Quanta Lord heals by that amount.
In this world, it's eat.

card.name: The Impartial Judge
card.text:
{Flash} Exert: Deal X damage to both a friendly and enemy target. You choose the value of X, but it cannot exceed the friendly target's toughness.
Objection overruled.

card.name: Over Vortex
card.text:
At the end of your turn, send cards from your hand to the bottom of your deck until you have 3. Then, deal damage to a Quanta Lord equal to the amount of cards you sent.
Diverting excess power into OBLITERATION!

card.name: Sudden Strike
card.text:
Summon a unit from your hand and immediately attack a unit with it. Return it to your hand after battle.
One of the oldest moves, if not the oldest.

card.name: Curse of the Mummy
card.text:
{Battle} Purge the opposing unit and give it this effect.
Return the slab, or suffer my curse...

card.name: Chronological Sendoff
card.text:
Annihilate a unit from your hand. Echo 10: Play that unit for free.
Save the future.

card.name: Magical Theorist
card.text:
{Upkeep} Scry 1. If it's a support, add it to your hand.
Eye of newt, toe of frog, wool of bat...

card.name: Legacy Theft
card.text:
Annihilate a card from a graveyard.
If history makes us who we are, I'm afraid you're getting unmade.

card.name: Soul Drain
card.text:
{Upkeep} Steal 1 toughness and 1 life from a Quanta Lord.
At first, they feel nothing, then, they feel nothing.

card.name: Pact with the Reaper
card.text:
This turn, you can play units from your graveyard, but you take damage equal to their Quanta cost.
To pull necromancy of this caliber off, you have to get close to death yourself.

card.name: Quack
card.text:
{Upkeep} Deal 1 damage to ALL ENEMIES.
Make it stop. MAKE IT STOP!
